body:
Comment 6: 
Looking at the post-walk

Without optimizations (-N), this appears:

00006 (issue8057.go:7)	VARDEF	,"".autotmp_0000+-8(SP)
	varkill=autotmp_0000
00007 (issue8057.go:7)	MOVQ	"".statictmp_0001+0(SB),BX
00008 (issue8057.go:7)	MOVQ	BX,"".autotmp_0000+-8(SP)

It is generated by the following ast:

after walk f
.   BLOCK-init
.   .   AS u(2) l(7) tc(1)
.   .   .   NAME-main.autotmp_0000 u(1) a(1) l(7) x(0+0) class(PAUTO) esc(N) tc(1)
used(1) ARRAY-[1]CHAN-chan bool
.   .   .   NAME-main.statictmp_0001 u(1) a(1) l(7) x(0+0) class(PEXTERN) f(1) tc(1)
used(1) ARRAY-[1]CHAN-chan bool

It somehow disappears without -N.
